headings.text: How to Play Monster Truck Mountain Climb

controls: D/Right Arrow: AccelerateA/Left Arrow: Brake or reverseW/Up Arrow: JumpS/Down Arrow: Tilt backward
content.howToPlay: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to control your monster truck.Keep an eye on your monster truck's health bar at the top. If it drops to zero, your truck explodes, and you'll need to restart the level.Perform mid-air flips to earn an extra 3 coins. These coins are crucial for unlocking new trucks and upgrading your engine and brakes.Collect all coins and finish up levels.
content.tips:
Going too fast can damage your truck, but too slow can leave you stuck in sharp inclines. Find the right balance.Tilt forward or backward to land safely after jumps. This prevents damage and helps keep your health bar intact.Use ramps to perform flips mid-air and rack up extra coins. Practice makes perfect!Start by upgrading your engine to conquer steep hills, then improve your brakes for better control.Don’t get discouraged if you fail. Each level is a learning experience!

Are you ready to climb to the top and become the ultimate monster truck driver? Start your engines and take on the challenge of Monster Truck Mountain Climb!
